channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: The Next Step
channel.desc: Summer receives a letter offering a life-changing opportunity that would ruin Cleo's plans and wrestles with the decision of whether to follow her heart or stick with Cleo. Meanwhile, Winnie tries to convince Nick to use tap in a routine, but an injury forces her to recruit other dancers who don?t share her passion. And Richelle begins to question her own dance future.
